Package org.github.stevemorse.disnlpbot

Class DisNLPBot

java.lang.Object
org.github.stevemorse.disnlpbot.DisNLPBot
public final class DisNLPBot
extends java.lang.Object
The DisNLPBot strips all messages from all channels of a Discord guild to which it attached and stores them to a file as serialized objects
Version:
1.0
Author:
Steve Morse

    • execute

      public void execute()
      The execute method picks up commands written in a discord channel and performs the actions dictated by the commands posted. Valid commands are: !ping which returns a message !pong from the bot to the same channel in which !ping was posted, !get which gets all the messages from all channels of a guild and stores them to a new File, and !update which gets all new messages from all channels of a guild since last !get or !update and appends them to the serialized file of stored posts

    • scrub

      private void scrub​(java.lang.String filename)
      The scrub method ensures the File object from past gets is deleted
      Parameters:
      filename - String

    • getMessageData

      private static Post getMessageData​(discord4j.core.object.entity.Message message)
      Processes one Message object into a Post object
      Parameters:
      message - a discord4j core Message object of a single message posted on a discord channel
      Returns:
      a Post object containing the relevant data extracted from the message

    • writeToFile

      private void writeToFile​(java.util.List<Post> posts)
      Writes a List of Posts to file using a ObjectOutputStream if the file does not yet exist and a AppendingObjectOutputStream if it does
      Parameters:
      posts - List of Posts

    • readFromFile

      private java.util.List<Post> readFromFile()
      Reads a serialized file of Post objects and returns them as a List
      Returns:
      List of Posts

    • getLastPost

      private static Post getLastPost​(java.util.List<Post> posts)
      Finds the latest post object in a List of Post objects
      Parameters:
      posts - List of Posts
      Returns:
      Post the chronologically last occurring Post object in a List of Post objects
